meta.title: HR Round (Chat)
tips: Keep answers structured: Situation → Task → Action → Result (STAR).
Add one concrete example in each answer.

questions.q: Tell me about yourself in 60 seconds.
Why do you want this role?
Describe a time you failed. What did you learn?
Explain one of your projects to a non-technical person.
If you disagree with your teammate, what do you do?
Where do you see yourself in 2 years?
